patthana14.30:1.1: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.30:2.1: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.30:3.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.30:4.1: Savicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.30:5.1: Avicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.30:6.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
